revision.text: * '''{{LE|Ammo.BackpackAmount}}''' ''amount'' :The amount of this ammo type received from a backpack. * '''{{LE|Ammo.BackpackMaxAmount}}''' ''amount'' :The maximum amount of this ammo type that can be carried with a backpack. * '''{{LE|Ammo.DropAmount}}''' ''amount'' :Specifies the amount of ammo a dropped item without any explicit amount given contains. By default ammo amount is reduced by half when it's dropped by enemies, but this property can override that. Note that dropped amount can also be explicitly set in the {{Property|DropItem}} property. [[Category:Editing references]]
